website_summaries.verdict: Despite the high price tag, this automatic toaster is worth considering for consumers who love smart gadgets and have flexible budgets.
pros: As a member of the brand's Pro Line series, this toaster offers intuitive capabilities that include automatic lowering when bread is dropped in the slots and automatic lifting when it's done
Wide slots fit bagels and thick bread
cons: Smart functions won't appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: this doesn't toast any better than other toasters
customer_reviews.text: This is all gloss and style...this doesn't toast any better than other toasters...it is kind of like taking a Limousine instead of a Cab either way you will get to the airport your just gonna look more posh in the back of a stretch than a cab. That is how I sum up this item. Eye candy for your kitchen, if aesthetics matter for you then the price is worth it. If you just want some toast no need to spend $300. I personally love this item...but then again I like pretty things.

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster

If you don't retrieve the toast right away, it keeps it warm until you do. It also has a setting for frozen bread, bagels, waffles, etc. I love the retro look, the pearl white is just gorgeous! Complements the rest of my white KitchenAid appliances.

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KMT2203FP Pro Line Series Frosted Pearl White 2-Slice Automatic Toaster
product_meta.description:
The KitchenAid Pro Line Series two-slice automatic toaster is equipped with a host of smart features for effortless toasting. The automatic Keep Warm function keeps toast warm for up to three minutes after toasting. Automatic lift and lower automatically lowers bread into the self-centering racks upon sensing bread in a slot, then lifts bread as soon as it has reached the selected shade. Seven shade settings allow you to choose precisely how light or dark you want your toast. Bagel and frozen functions make it easy to toast bagels or defrost. Backed by a manufacturers five year limited warranty, this professional two-slice toaster is sure to guarantee satisfaction.

13-7/10" L x 7-1/10" W x 8-9/10" H
